name: Splitter
description: Splitter is utilized to separate and resize panels

layout.label: layout
layout.title: Orientation of the panels, valid values are "horizontal" and "vertical".

gutter-size.label: gutterSize
gutter-size.title: Size of the divider in pixels.

state-key.label: stateKey
state-key.title: Storage identifier of a stateful Splitter.

state-storage.label: stateStorage
state-storage.title: Defines where a stateful splitter keeps its state, valid values are "session" for sessionStorage and "local" for localStorage.

step.label: step
step.title: Step factor to increment/decrement the size of the panels while pressing the arrow keys.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: resizened
events.title: Callback to invoke when resize ends.

arguments.name: event.sizes
arguments.description: Sizes of the panels as an array
